SECTION_CONTENT:
Handling
Wear personal protective equipment. Do not breathe vapors or spray mist. Do not get in
eyes, on skin, or on clothing. Do not ingest.
Storage
Keep containers tightly closed in a dry, cool and well-ventilated place. Corrosives area.
